text:
@anniekarni Based on known statistics, if the same number of Americans catch #coronavirus as the minimum estimate of those who catch the flu and the 2-3% mortality rate holds up, we're looking at 180,000 to 270,000 deaths in the U.S.
But, sure, it's all about hurting Trump.

domain.name: Person

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
